fields.name: AutoScaleSettings
fields.description: Cosmos DB resource for autoscale settings. Either throughput is required or autoscaleSettings is required, but not both.

fields.name: InstantMaximumThroughput
fields.description: The offer throughput value to instantly scale up without triggering splits

fields.name: MinimumThroughput
fields.description: The minimum throughput of the resource

fields.name: SoftAllowedMaximumThroughput
fields.description: The maximum throughput value or the maximum maxThroughput value (for autoscale) that can be specified

fields.name: Throughput
fields.description: Value of the Cosmos DB resource throughput. Either throughput is required or autoscaleSettings is required, but not both.
